title: The program keeps getting errors.
body:
- **Video2X release version**: video2x-4.7.0-win32-full
- **Upscaler version**:
- **GUI version**: 2.8.0
- **CLI version**:



## Symptom

I was going to upscale Annie, but there is an error. Why does the program have the same error even if the settings are different?




## Error Log or Screenshots



[32m[+] INFO: Loading files into processing queue[0m
